__e: My initial reaction was, "How can they do that?"
I mean, how can they do this?
What can they do in a minute that they didn't do all weekend?
And in 10,000 years, it will still be exactly the same because, really, what else can they do?
What or who do they talk about?
What could they possibly be asking for with so many lives in stake?
What they want with aenlisted marine who makes less than $32,000 a year.
How can they fight an enemy that they don't believe in?
Can these two men part in peace and live to kill another day?
I mean, how can they ever feel comfortable around me again?
How can eyes that have seen so much be brought to life by a simple thing?
I mean, uh, how bad can they be?
Wait, so if these are supposed to be just fake businesses,... how come their financials are so squeaky clean?
Why can't people take what I do seriously? !
Why can't people know that this party is supposed to be about us?
Why can't someone just comeand tell us what's going on?
How many times can they put us through that?
What are they going to tell us that we don't already know?
And I can't help but look At all your wonderful, beautiful faces And think, "how could they do this to us?"
